title: “Public Building” means a building used or intended to be used either ordinarily or occasionally by
clause_text: “Public Building” means a building used or intended to be used either ordinarily or occasionally by the public such as; temple, mosque, church, chapel, or any place of public worship. public or private college, school, library, or places of educational facilities.
